events.message: I just received the new headphones I ordered, but the left speaker is making a crackling noise whenever I play audio.
The issue reported involves a faulty component in the delivered product, categorizing this case as a product defect.
Assigning this case to the technical support team specializing in hardware issues for further investigation.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the speaker problem with your headphones. I’m here to help you get this sorted out.
Could you please confirm if the crackling noise occurs with all audio sources and if you have tried different cables or devices?
Yes, the crackling happens with every device and every cable I have tried. It definitely seems like a hardware defect.
We will arrange a replacement to be sent out to you immediately and provide a prepaid label for you to return the faulty headphones at no cost.
Thank you for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick arrangement for the replacement.
Your replacement order has been processed and a return shipping label emailed. Please let us know once you've sent back the defective item.
We wanted to check in and see if you have received the replacement headphones and if everything is working as expected.
Yes, I received the new headphones yesterday, and they’re working perfectly. Thank you again for your support!
We are glad to hear the replacement is working well. Closing the case now, and feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
